Detailed Description

Classification stage statistics of NessieOcr.

This class stores all the statistical data gathered during execution of methods of the classification stage. Data can be write or read, although a client program should be only interested in reading values. The statistical data is automatically set whenever a method from a Classifier or ClassificationAlgorithm object is called, but only the fields that method uses.

See also:
Statistics, Classifier, ClassificationAlgorithm
Author:
Eliezer Talón (elitalon@gmail.com)
Date:
2009-01-12
